content: Brings to mind my answer to the question, “what startups do we still need?” https://www.quora.com/What-startups-do-we-still-need/answer/Bonnie-Foley-Wong Whilst there may be a market for simple Internet products, mobile apps or other problems of convenience, we still have many more challenges of basic or even efficient access to essential resources we need to sustain ourselves, express ourselves, connect with others, manage change, make decisions, or as a means of exchange. I’m seeing signs that we are on a path towards impact investing and venture capital converging.
